videos.title: Surah Al-Fatiha with Translation
videos.description: Beautiful recitation of Surah Al-Fatiha with English translation and detailed explanation of each verse's meaning and significance in daily prayers.
videos.speaker: Sheikh Mishary Rashid Alafasy

videos.title: Surah Yasin Full Recitation
videos.description: Complete recitation of Surah Yasin, known as the heart of the Quran, with beautiful tajweed and melodious voice.
videos.speaker: Sheikh Abdul Rahman Al-Sudais

videos.title: 40 Hadith Nawawi - Introduction
videos.description: Introduction to the famous collection of 40 Hadith compiled by Imam Nawawi, explaining the importance of these hadiths in daily life.
videos.speaker: Dr. Yasir Qadhi

videos.title: The Prophet's Character (Seerah)
videos.description: Detailed lecture about the beautiful character and manners of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) and how to implement them in our lives.
videos.speaker: Mufti Menk

videos.title: The Importance of Seeking Knowledge
videos.description: Friday lecture about the virtue of seeking Islamic knowledge and its importance in the life of a Muslim.
videos.speaker: Mufti Ismail Menk

videos.title: Fiqh of Prayer (Salah)
videos.description: Comprehensive guide to the rules and etiquette of prayer according to the Quran and Sunnah.
videos.speaker: Sheikh Assim Al-Hakeem

videos.title: Prophet Stories for Children - Prophet Adam
videos.description: Animated story of Prophet Adam (AS) designed for children with engaging visuals and simple explanation.
videos.speaker: Islamic Kids TV

videos.title: Arabic Alphabet for Beginners
videos.description: Learn Arabic alphabet from scratch with proper pronunciation and writing practice.
videos.speaker: Ustadh Nouman Ali Khan

videos.title: Morning and Evening Adhkar
videos.description: Complete collection of morning and evening remembrances from authentic sources with English translation.
videos.speaker: Sheikh Muhammad bin Salih Al-Uthaymin

videos.title: Surah Al-Mulk - Explanation
videos.description: Detailed tafsir of Surah Al-Mulk, explaining its virtues and deep meanings verse by verse.
videos.speaker: Dr. Zakir Naik

videos.title: The Five Pillars of Islam
videos.description: Basic introduction to the five pillars of Islam for new Muslims and those seeking to refresh their knowledge.
videos.speaker: Dr. Bilal Philips

videos.title: Islamic Manners for Children
videos.description: Teaching children basic Islamic manners and etiquette through fun animation and stories.
videos.speaker: Little Muslims TV

speakers.name: Sheikh Mishary Rashid Alafasy
speakers.bio: Famous Quran reciter from Kuwait, known for his beautiful voice and tajweed.

speakers.name: Dr. Yasir Qadhi
speakers.bio: American Islamic scholar and lecturer, Dean of Academic Affairs at AlMaghrib Institute.

speakers.name: Mufti Menk
speakers.bio: Zimbabwean Islamic scholar, known for his motivational lectures and simple explanations.

speakers.name: Sheikh Assim Al-Hakeem
speakers.bio: Saudi Arabian Islamic scholar specializing in fiqh and fatwa.

speakers.name: Dr. Zakir Naik
speakers.bio: Indian Islamic preacher and comparative religion scholar.

speakers.name: Ustadh Nouman Ali Khan
speakers.bio: Pakistani-American Islamic speaker and Arabic linguist.
